<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Shows object defined in global config in CfgTitles </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''titleObj''' [class, type, speed, showInMap] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [class, type, speed, showInMap]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - defined in <tt>[[configFile]] >> "CfgTitles" >> class</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> type: [[String]] one of "PLAIN", "PLAIN DOWN", "BLACK", "BLACK FADED", "BLACK OUT", "BLACK IN", "WHITE OUT" and "WHITE IN". See [[Title Effect Type]]s for more information about these values.</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> speed (Optional): [[Number]] - Time in seconds to fade in resource. Default: -1 </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> showInMap (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to hide the text when the map is opened. Default: [[true]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[titleObj]] ["BISLogo", "PLAIN"]</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[titleText]], [[titleRsc]], [[cutRsc]], [[cutObj]], [[cutText]], [[allActiveTitleEffects]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
